title: Frank_Holo
author: Frank_Holo
content: Sup guys, I have some long haul flights coming up and would love some mobile game recommendation's (offline preferably).I like a lot of the puzzle stuff which is usually offline friendly but if anyone's got some hidden gems it would be much appreciated!I don't mind paying for game by the way

comments.author: NomiPk
comments.body: There are too many games. offline and online. The open-world game is Pubg and Minecraft etc. The time pass game is Surbay Surfer and Temple Run. The shooting game is Pubg, Free Fire, and Shooting Range. But I think online games are better than offline games.

comments.author: R1dwanRz
comments.body: Quote from: Frank_Holo on August 24, 2023, 10:05:31 AMSup guys, I have some long haul flights coming up and would love some mobile game recommendation's (offline preferably).I like a lot of the puzzle stuff which is usually offline friendly but if anyone's got some hidden gems it would be much appreciated!I don't mind paying for game by the wayWhy not give Truckers of Europe 3 a try? It boasts stunning graphics and can be played offline. Personally, I'm usually into Undawn or Lifeafter games for that apocalyptic vibe.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: heres some of the games i played and liked:1. Color Water Sort Puzzle Games: many different colored test tube would be given to convert one color in one test tube.2. Hungry Shark Evolution: this is an open ocean game you need to control a shark, eat and survive.3. Asphalt 8 - Car Racing Game: it takes more storage than other but amazing to play car game.4. Beach Buggy Blitz: racing game with amazing controls.5. Going Balls: it's like driving a ball on different tracks with challenges.6. Solitaire - Classic Card Games: easy to play very interesting and puzzly card game.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: If you love wars, history, and geography you can play European War VII - Medieval. It's like a chess game but the pieces you are controlling are your armies. You will also manage your cities while conquering other cities that are at war with you.

comments.body: I'd recommend a game I play when waiting for something or standing in public queues.Water Sort Puzzle - Sort Color (Google Play link)This game is genuinely fun and doesn't require intense thinking. comments.author: Ricardo11
comments.body: Any game, offline or online, if it doesn't entertain you, what's the point of playing it? Anyway, I will share three games to entertain you offline, that is 1) Dead target 2) Extreme car driving 3) crazy for speed. You will get a lot of entertainment by playing these three games offline. Now I will share you three online games, that is 1) Free fire 2) pubg 3) Call of duty. You will enjoy a lot of entertainment by playing these three online games. Moreover, online games are more enjoyable than offline games.
